name: Dellinger
text: On K.O. Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. Then, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Donquixote Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. Then, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Donquixote Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
